nome: Shokugeki no Souma: San no Sara - Kyokuseiryou no Erina

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Shokugeki no Souma: San no Sara - Kyokuseiryou no Erina
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: Food Wars! The Third Plate OVA - Erina's New Life
metadata_completo.sinopse:
Following the sudden changes to Tootsuki Culinary Academy's administration, Erina Nakiri runs away from home to escape the torment of her oppressive father. Taking refuge at Polar Star Dormitory, the chaotic environment she ends up in is a far cry from her usual refined lifestyle. However, with the help of her friends, Erina gradually finds her place among the dormitory's eccentric residentsâ€”creating memorable experiences outside the world of cooking along the way.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
